## Item details

  * Handmade 

  * Materials: Brass 

A GIFT THAT STANDS IN TIME: If you are looking for the ultimate gift for your
beloved one, then we have got you covered. Combining, simplicity, elegance and
durability, our sundials make wonderful presents that will be appreciated for
many years to come! You cannot go wrong with our range of sundials.  
  
Scroll down to explore the collection on the links below.  
  
THE PERFECT GIFT FOR ALL: Our handmade sundial collection is here to
accommodate even the most demanding needs! Ideal for a birthday, anniversary,
retirement or Christmas and every celebration in between; for him and her,
your favourite couple, your parents or grandparents, dear friends and beloved
ones!  
  
***********************************************************  
FOR BOTH INDOOR & OUTDOOR USE: Each 6.25” sundial comes with a bracket to
facilitate the sundial to stand on its own at an angle indoors for ornamental
purposes. Alternatively, each sundial can be purchased with our outdoor large
pedestal stand if you do not have a plinth to mount the sundial onto.  
  
99% RECYCLED: All our plaques and sundials are made from SCRAP METAL and are
completely recyclable with absolutely NO PLASTIC. Feel free to reuse the
packaging once your sundial or plaque has its special place in your home,
office or garden.  
  
MADE IN THE UK: All our sundials and plaques are proudly and completely
handmade in the United Kingdom by skillful English craftsmen. These solid
heavy duty hand polished cast brass sundials are forged as they have been for
hundreds of years, using traditional sand casting. Each one is then painted
with quality outdoor paint, fully lacquered on completion for extra
protection, to enable it to endure wind, rain, frost and the occasional
British sunshine.  
  
DIMENSIONS: Diameter 160mm (6¼") and height with gnomon 75mm (3").  
  
**********************************************************  
The inscription on the 2023 Love is Wedding Anniversary standard text sundial
reads as follows:  
  
"It takes no time to fall in love  
But it takes years to know what love is  
Happy Anniversary 2023"  
  
The Love is Wedding Anniversary sundial is cast from solid Brass and comes
with a Black painted background.  
  
Please note, orders for standard items are usually dispatched the same day if
ordered before 1pm GMT. Or dispatched the following business day if ordered
after 1pm.  
  
  
*******************************************************************  
NOT QUITE WHAT YOU'RE AFTER?  
  
Check out our other anniversary sundials here;  
  
https://www.etsy.com/shop/TheMetalFoundry  
  
Our Golden Wedding Anniversary Sundial is a popular choice. Find the Golden
Anniversary Sundial here;  
  
https://www.etsy.com/listing/619001751/  
  
We also offer wedding day sundials. Show your favourite couple how much you
care by getting them an amazing wedding gift. Our ‘Sunny Days’ and ‘Years
Together’ wedding day gift sundials can be found here ;  
  
https://www.etsy.com/shop/TheMetalFoundry?section_id=27261133  
  
https://www.etsy.com/shop/TheMetalFoundry?section_id=27261125

##  FAQs

How can I order a bespoke plaque?

It’s easy! Simply email our team via the contact us link on our Etsy shop
(link below) and provide us with all the details regarding your custom order.  
  
https://www.etsy.com/shop/TheMetalFoundry

How do I care for my plaque/sundial?

We leave you very little to do!!! Just dust the sundial occasionally or use a
damp cloth to wipe the dust off it.  
Our sundials are polished to a fine shine, painted in a special RP9 outdoor
quality paint and then coated in two coats of super protective lacquer. They
are built to last, representing the strength of the love that they
commemorate.

Will my text and numbers be centred on the plaque?

Text and numbers will always be centred unless we are advised otherwise. We
will always place the text on the plaque or sundial in such a manner as to
provide the best finished product.

Where can I find the dimensions of the plaque/sundial that I want to purchase?

The dimensions of any of our products will be in the product description.

How do I provide my custom details for my order?

You can either email us with the custom details of your desired plaque or add
these details in the ‘Add your personalisation’ box provided.  
You can also provide us with any instructions using the ‘Note to Seller’ box
at checkout during your order.

Custom and personalised orders

Yes, this is possible. We can however only cast very simple line drawings for
which we would require a black and white vector style image from you.  
If you are unsure, please contact us and we will see how best to assist.

What is your return policy?

You must return or exchange your purchase within 90 days of purchase. However,
as per our conditions of returning any item, the buyer is responsible for
return postage costs and for loss in value (as agreed upon with the seller) if
an item isn’t returned in its original condition.  
Please note, if you purchase a completely bespoke item, you are encouraged to
contact us beforehand.

What is your exchange policy?

You must return or exchange your purchase within 90 days of purchase. However,
as per our conditions of returning any item, the buyer is responsible for
return postage costs and for loss in value (as agreed upon with seller) if an
item isn’t returned in its original condition.  
Please note, if you purchase a completely bespoke item, you are encouraged to
contact us beforehand.

Does the sundial come with a stand?

Both the 6.25” and 10” sundials come with a small mounting bracket that works
as a display stand for your sundial. If you wish to order the sundial and the
large outdoor stand, please select the ‘+outdoor stand’ option from the drop-
down menu. Alternatively, you can purchase the large pedestal stand later from
here;  
  
https://www.etsy.com/listing/634991725

I would like to customise my sundial; how can I do this?

We offer a standard text sundial and a custom sundial. Ensure that you are on
the custom sundial listing on which you get instructions on how to provide
your custom details. First, select your stand option, then your preferred
sundial size and material, and then add your personalisation based on the
instructions provided. Please be sure to separate each block of text for each
curve or line by using a double forward slash ‘//’.

### Privacy Settings

Etsy uses cookies and similar technologies to give you a better experience,
enabling things like:

  * basic site functions
  * ensuring secure, safe transactions
  * secure account login
  * remembering account, browser, and regional preferences
  * remembering privacy and security settings
  * analysing site traffic and usage
  * personalized search, content, and recommendations
  * helping sellers understand their audience
  * showing relevant, targeted ads on and off Etsy

Detailed information can be found in Etsy’s Cookies & Similar Technologies
Policy and our Privacy Policy.

## Required Cookies & Technologies

Some of the technologies we use are necessary for critical functions like
security and site integrity, account authentication, security and privacy
preferences, internal site usage and maintenance data, and to make the site
work correctly for browsing and transactions.

Always on

## Personalized Advertising

To enable personalized advertising (like interest-based ads), we may share
your data with our marketing and advertising partners using cookies and other
technologies. Those partners may have their own information they’ve collected
about you. Turning off the personalized advertising setting won’t stop you
from seeing Etsy ads, but it may make the ads you see less relevant or more
repetitive.

Personalized advertising may be considered a “sale” or “sharing” of
information under California and other state privacy laws, and you may have a
right to opt out. Turning off personalized advertising allows you to exercise
your right to opt out. Learn more in our Privacy Policy., Help Center, and
Cookies & Similar Technologies Policy.

I absolutely love this sign. It matches my address plaque perfectly. I
would’ve given 5 stars if it hadn’t taken so long for me to actually be able
to put it up. Delivery was quick, but they actually sent me the wrong sign.
The second time, they sent me the correct sign but the hardware completely
broke. One would think the screw would strip before snapping, but the material
is so soft that the head came clean off with very little effort. I reached out
to the company and asked for replacement screws. They apologized and said they
would send out replacements. However, I then received a sundial gnomon instead
of the screws. I reached out again and they sent out the correct replacement.
That being said, communication was great and each delivery was speedy. Because
of customer service and product quality, I’d still recommend them.
